## Task interface

Task for doing some work, it can be sync or async

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Task<R, E = Error>
```

| Property                            | Modifiers | Type                                                                                                                                                                                  | Description                 |

| [reject](./models.task.reject.md)   |           | (e: E) =&gt; void                                                                                                                                                                     | Reject the task with error  |
| [resolve](./models.task.resolve.md) |           | (r: R) =&gt; void                                                                                                                                                                     | Resolve the task with value |
